#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define SIZE 1001
using namespace std;
int east[SIZE][SIZE],west[SIZE][SIZE],north[SIZE][SIZE],south[SIZE][SIZE],data[SIZE][SIZE];
int main()
{
    int t;
    //freopen("input.cpp","rt",stdin);
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        //cout<<"---------------------------------------------------------------------------\n";
        int n,m;
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        //int data[n][m];
        //int east[n][m],west[n][m],north[n][m],south[n][m];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                scanf("%d",&data[i][j]);
                west[i][j]=(j==0)?data[i][j]:min(data[i][j],data[i][j]+west[i][j-1]);
                north[i][j]=(i==0)?data[i][j]:min(data[i][j],data[i][j]+north[i-1][j]);
            }
        }
        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--){
            for(int j=m-1;j>=0;j--){
                east[i][j]=j==m-1?data[i][j]:min(data[i][j],data[i][j]+east[i][j+1]);
                south[i][j]=i==n-1?data[i][j]:min(data[i][j],data[i][j]+south[i+1][j]);
            }
        }
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
        /*
        cout<<"east=\n";
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                cout<<east[i][j]<<" ";
            }
            cout<<endl;
        }
        cout<<"west=\n";
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                cout<<west[i][j]<<" ";
            }
            cout<<endl;
        }
        cout<<"north=\n";
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                cout<<north[i][j]<<" ";
            }
            cout<<endl;
        }
        cout<<"south=\n";
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                cout<<south[i][j]<<" ";
            }
            cout<<endl;
        }
        */
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        int mini=0x7faaaaaa;
        int xpos,ypos;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
                int total=east[i][j]+west[i][j]+north[i][j]+south[i][j]-3*data[i][j];
                if(total<mini){
                  mini=total;
                  xpos=i;ypos=j;
                }
                //mini=min(total,mini);
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",mini);
        //cout<<"x position="<<xpos<<" y position="<<ypos<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
